DOC.brief_title: Rehabilitative Ultrasound Imaging : Measurements Articular Movement Shoulder
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study image articular joint movement glenohumeral joint utilize ultrasound imaging ( USI ) . Specific aim include : 1 ) measurement distance articular surface rest ; 2 ) measurement distance articular surface manually apply glide surface ; 3 ) analysis association amount glide report joint mobility , force application , joint position . Subjects recruit population convenience . After consent participate , eligible subject complete demographic questionnaire pretesting scapular shoulder mobility . Two day test schedule . On first day , three grade glenohumeral mobilization apply follow direction : distraction , posterior inferior . A handheld dynamometer measure force ; ultrasound imaging record glenohumeral joint position . Each grade direction repeat three time right leave shoulder . On second day , mobilization repeat . Measurements humeral movement calculate ultrasound image .
DOC.criteria: asymptomatic subject history neck , shoulder , arm pain ; full active pain free range motion cervical spine shoulder neuromuscular musculoskeletal disorder ; connective tissue disorder rheumatoid arthritis ; inflammatory condition Crohns disease ; Down 's syndrome ; Marfan 's syndrome ; medically diagnose hypermobility ; history neck , shoulder arm trauma , pain , surgery include dislocation rotator cuff tear ; pregnancy ; metal implant
